frontmatter.title: Design Life-Cycle of a Jira Issue
frontmatter.description: This checklist covers the steps to follow when designing for an ongoing project. The checklist for starting out to a new design project can be found in the design category.

frontmatter.title: Hiring Process
frontmatter.description: Make sure that the documents of the employee who will start work are complete and ensure that they are protected

frontmatter.title: Orientation Programme
frontmatter.description: Follow the programme to quickly adapt the employee to the Atolye15 culture and own position.

frontmatter.title: Writing a Case Study
frontmatter.description: The checklist we abide by when we write a case study about a new project.

frontmatter.title: Arrange an Internal Meetup
frontmatter.description: Steps before arranging an internal meetup

frontmatter.title: Creating Color Palette(s)
frontmatter.description: One of the essentials of every UI style guide is the color palette(s). There are certain things you need to follow in order to create more scalable UIs.

frontmatter.title: Creating Interactive Prototypes
frontmatter.description: Creating interactive prototypes is an important step in the product design process. Use this checklist to make sure you cover the basics of creating them!

frontmatter.title: Newcomer Accounts Checklist
frontmatter.description: The accounts and invitations we need to provide for the newcomers.

frontmatter.title: Password Generation Rules
frontmatter.description: These are the rules you need to follow when you generate any kind of password

frontmatter.title: Posting on Social Media
frontmatter.description: The guideline we follow when we post on our social media accounts. This checklist is important to understand our culture and our posting tips and tricks.

frontmatter.title: Preparation of a Case Study
frontmatter.description: The marketing to-do's we complete to come up with a new case study.

frontmatter.description: Follow these steps to find the right candidate. It helps to understand the candidate's technical capabilities and their profile

frontmatter.title: Setting Up a New Symfony Project from Scratch
frontmatter.description: Steps we follow when starting a new project with Symfony. We recommend you to commit your changes in VCS you use after each step. Every To-do title can be a commit message for you.
